name: tm70
effect: Teaches Flash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flash to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.
